item.description: Nothing like a relaxing hike at Breakheart Reservation. This is more of a walk than a hike, although there is a decent view from Eagle Rock. If people are feeling more ambitious, there's always Ridge Trail. We'll be meeting at the Vocational School parking lot - that's the Wakefield side. Email me if you need directions or get lost. This should be a great first meetup where people can take a leisurely walk and get to know each other. The more the merrier!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting at the gate
item.name: Breakheart Hike
